abstract: NBC won the slimmest of victories in the ratings on Wednesday over CBS, largely due to an advantage in game show programming. At 8 p.m., “Deal or No Deal” on NBC attracted nearly twice the number of viewers as “Power of 10″ on CBS, 13.3 million versus 6.1 million, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
lead_paragraph: NBC won the slimmest of victories in the ratings on Wednesday over CBS, largely due to an advantage in game show programming. At 8 p.m., “Deal or No Deal” on NBC attracted nearly twice the number of viewers as “Power of 10″ on CBS, 13.3 million versus 6.1 million, according to Nielsen’s estimates.
